chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product iPhone 13 mini has the above problem:

I received my phone today and had to notice that it has a clearly visible scratch/marker on the side. This can also be seen from more than 20 cm away. Otherwise, the phone is really great and I would like to keep it, but this scratch at the edge is already quite annoying...

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

We will make a partial refund of €60.00 to the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Fabio from Back Market
